name: Crepes
instructions: In a blender, combine all of the ingredients
Use the soup setting on the blender or pulse 10 times.
Refrigerate for an hour up to 48 hours (optional).
Pour 1 ounce of batter into the center of the pan and swirl to spread evenly.
Cook for another 10 seconds and remove to the cutting board.
Lay them out flat so they can cool.
Continue until all batter is gone.
Add 1/4 teaspoon salt and 1/4 cup chopped fresh herbs, spinach or sun-dried tomatoes to the egg mixture.
Add 2 ½ Tablespoons sugar, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract and 2 tablespoons of your favorite liqueur to the egg mixture.
